Package com.example.project4

Class CoffeeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.CoffeeController
public class CoffeeController extends Object
This class contains methods that allow the user to add or remove coffee orders to the ordering basket
Author:
Steven Tan, David Fabian

  • Constructor Details

    • CoffeeController

      public CoffeeController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the necessary components (Comboboxes, List views) by setting the observable arrays for each. The itemPrice is set to $1.89, the chosenQuantity is set to 1, and the cupSize is set to Short by all by default

    • addCaramel

      protected void addCaramel()
      Adds caramel to the order if the item is selected and is not in the listOfAddsins. If the item is unselected, the coffeeOrder removes caramel from it. The itemPrice increases by $0.30 if added and vice versa.

    • addIrishCream

      protected void addIrishCream()
      Adds Irish cream to the order if the item is selected and is not in the listOfAddsins. If the item is unselected, the coffeeOrder removes Irish cream from it. The itemPrice increases by $0.30 if added and vice versa.

    • addVanilla

      protected void addVanilla()
      Adds vanilla to the order if the item is selected and is not in the listOfAddsins. If the item is unselected, the coffeeOrder removes vanilla from it. The itemPrice increases by $0.30 if added and vice versa.

    • addFrenchVanilla

      protected void addFrenchVanilla()
      Adds French vanilla to the order if the item is selected and is not in the listOfAddsins. If the item is unselected, the coffeeOrder removes French vanilla from it. The itemPrice increases by $0.30 if added and vice versa.

    • addSweetCream

      protected void addSweetCream()
      Adds sweet cream to the order if the item is selected and is not in the listOfAddsins. If the item is unselected, the coffeeOrder removes sweet cream from it. The itemPrice increases by $0.30 if added and vice versa.

    • setCupSize

      protected void setCupSize()
      Sets the cupSize to the size that is selected in the ComboBox. The itemPrice changes in accordance to whatever price the cupSize is worth.

    • setQuantity

      protected void setQuantity()
      Sets the cupSize to the quantity that is selected in the ComboBox. The itemPrice changes to the product of the quantity value times the sum of the number of addins and cupSize.

    • addToOrder

      protected void addToOrder()
      Adds the most recent coffee order to the Order ArrayList after the user clicks on the "Add to Order" button

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(StoreFrontController controller)
      Sets the main controller to the StoreFrontController
      Parameters:
      controller - StoreFrontController for which to set this instance's main controller reference to.
